Key Match Events: Hwang Hee-chan scored first goal in 10 minutes
Lee Kang-in recorded the assist for Son’s goal
Jung Seung-hyun scored his first-ever goal for the national team in the 87th minute
Post-Match Reflections: Klinsmann praised the team’s performance and resilience
Regular striker picks Cho Gue-sung and Hwang Ui-jo showed improvements
The team’s attack no longer seems to be an issue
Miscellaneous Highlights: Korea took just 10 minutes to open the scoring
The team conceded no goals in six consecutive matches
Korea have four more matches in the second round of the Asian qualifiers left to play
The next qualifier is scheduled on March 21 against Thailand at home
